mapper.select: SELECT p.PLOGGING_ID AS ploggingId, p.TRAIL_ID AS trailId, p.MEMBER_ID AS memberId, p.PLOGGING_DATE AS ploggingDate2, p.PLOGGING_TIME AS ploggingTime, p.DISTANCE AS distance, p.START_LAT AS startLat, p.START_LNG AS startLng, p.IMAGE_URL AS image, t.TRAIL_NAME AS trailName, t.TRAIL_TYPE_NAME AS trailTypeName FROM PLOGGING p LEFT JOIN TRAIL t on t.TRAIL_ID = p.TRAIL_ID WHERE p.MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} ORDER BY p.PLOGGING_DATE DESC
